text: hello PDS family dr. Ireland Albert here I am excited to announce that next week Wednesday April 22 at 10 a.m. my good friend dr. John Magee will be joining me as my guest speaker for our live online
peripheral neuropathy workshop during the workshop we will discuss the most common causes of neuropathy and the most common approaches and why some of those approaches are not delivering the
results that you are looking for so if you or someone you love or someone you know would benefit from this workshop people are if you're having issues with numbness or weakness in your hands your
arms your feet your legs are you having some balance issues because of neuropathy then you would want to attend this workshop there is no registration this is a free workshop all you need to
do is click on the Zoom link that's included email or Facebook post but we do recommend the P log in early no later than 9:50 a.m. because our zoom account
only allows for a hundred attendees again we're looking to give you an arm you with tips and remedies you can do in the comfort of your own home to help you achieve your in hindered life life and
hindered by peripheral neuropathy so again we're looking forward to seeing you on Wednesday April 22 at 10:00 a.m. our live online free peripheral neuropathy workshop you will see you
then and please stay safe and healthy [Music]
